1.content:
You were excited at the thought of owning your own mansion and images of wild parties flow through your mind as your dad drives you through the quiet wooded road "not long now" he said feeling a little excited himself while your mum and sister smiled, the roof of the mansion soon came into view and everyone got excited as you pulled up at the front entrance "this is just awesome" you yell while your dad gives you a high five and your sister giggles.

After a 15 minute wait for the van to arrive you finally got to go in, the entrance hall was beautiful the paintings on the walls and the chandlier on the ceiling made this room a sight to behold and before long a woman entered through the double doors at the back with a smile on her face she walks over "hi i'm Missy the head maid here, i'll help you with any of your needs" your mum smiles and holds her hand out "i'm Cindy and these are Kyle, Jamie and Kelly" Missy smiled and nodded to you before turning around "now i'll show you to your rooms" and with that she began walking and you all followed stopping in the long halls outside polished wooden doors "this is Kelly's room and Jamie your room is this way" she motioned you to follow and you did reaching the door to your room then she motioned your parents "ok this way to your room" she said with a smile and lead your parents off down the hall towards another hall so you decide to venture into your room to check it out

11.content:
You open the door to your room and set down your bags just as you enter the room was beautiful the wooden walls and the large bed with a wooden frame looked ever so inviting, you could hear your sister unpacking which made you decide to unpack yourself "best to have it done and dusted" you say as you empty your clothes onto the floor before taking them and placing them in the draws at the far wall, the unpacking was done pretty quickly and so you looked around a bit more, the room had everything you could ever want a balcony, on-suite bathroom, TV and PC plus a mini fridge and chair, with excitement in your body you grab the remote and flick on the TV and watch some of your favorite shows "i can sure get used to this" you say.

You spend almost three hours watching TV when Kelly pokes her head in "hey bro Missy wants to have a meeting are you coming?" your not really one for attending meetings so you simply shake your head "no it's not mandatory is it?" Kelly shakes her head "good then no I'll stay and watch TV" Kelly nods and walks away leaving your door open as you watch an action movie, you grab a can of cola from the nearby fridge and take a few big gulps just as the movie ends, you check for any other movies and find an old classic zombie movie you watched as a child despite your parents saying no and you ended up scared out of your mind for weeks but you still love the movie.

As the movie finishes you switch off the TV and stretch before getting up to take a shower but as you reach the bathroom door...

14.content:
Upon entering your room you decide to take a nap, the deep, soft white bed feeling very inviting, set in it's rustic timber wood frame with the whole room outfitted with kind of a modern, "frontier look", with old metal traps and snow shoes hanging from the wall, your dresser sitting against the wall, made out solid oak, the sun drifting lazily through the window as you close your eyes, still dressed. An unknown amount of time passes by however as you begin to dream. You dream of being outside, you try to speak but find that difficult, instead hearing the coarse cries of an animal as you trot naked through the woods outside this house, feeling the dirt beneath your hardened feet. Your body feels strange.. and yet.. natural, somehow, you think as you look down your rubbery snout, reaching a cloven like hand up to touch it, squealing in shock. It is dark out and you're lost in the woods. Somewhere in the distance you can hear the maid, Missy calling out for you, "here, Piggy Piggy" she says, accentuating the "Piggy" part, hitting home that you're no longer human, you turn to look, seeing her somehow way off in the distance, "come swine! come get your slop! hahaha!" She laughs splashing some nasty brown water into a trough, complete with half eaten apples and carrots on top, floating about. You wake with a start. It is dark out.

"Jamie! Dinners ready" You hear distantly from down below, groggily turning over and looking at the LCD clock on your bed rest, the only source of illumination besides the golden setting sun in the distance, not giving much light as it sinks below the distant horizon. "Jamie! I wont say it again, dinners ready, come on down or you don't get anything to eat" you hear from your mum although she sounds not too serious, more joking really. With a stretch you stumble out of bed, for a moment thinking about how good that slop will be shaking the dream from your head as you tidy your clothes and head down the hallway, socks tapping and flopping quietly against the hard inlaid wood floor.

"Ah! There you are Jamie, I was just about to head upstairs for you, come sit down, Missy has prepared us a meal, isn't it wonderful?" your mum says as you take a seat at the table, Missy speaking up, "Oh, I'm sure you'll just love living here, I'll make sure there's always.. plenty to eat" She says, shooting a warm, if not cryptic look your way. The table has an amazing amount of food, almost like a set out of a movie, steaming corn on the cob, cornbread! Jello, some cranberry sauce, fried chicken as well as a few slices of steak, warm potatoes with butter melted on them and some fancy rolls off to the side, and oh yes.. one cannot forget the casserole. "I thought i'd warm you up with some of my very own home cooking" Missy says, not actually eating too much herself.

You look down at the veritable smorgasbord of food laid out before you. Everyone has already begun to dig in, consuming a rather large amount of food. You family seems to be acting slightly off, eating hungrily, as if starved. You shrug and look at the tasty vittles. You..
14.title: Cut straight to dinner time

choices: Missy Comes In With Some Food
Your Mum Comes In to Check On You
You Start Hearing Strange Noises
142.content:
You sit there staring at the food for a moment before lifting your head up and looking at your family stuffing their faces "You know I really don't feel that hungry" you say trying to wiggle your way out of dinner, Missy looks at you with a sad face "aww but I spent all afternoon cooking this feast" she says trying to guilt you into eating but after years of your mum doing that you no longer feel affected by it and stand up "I took a nap after arriving so I still need to unpack my things" you say over the sounds of the others eating noisily "you can unpack tomorrow" Missy says still trying to coax you into eating, you simply shake your head "I don't like to leave things unfinished" you say walking around the table passing your parents and out the dining room door "that was an odd dinner" you mumble quietly to yourself "they never eat that noisily" you add as you meander your way through the halls back to your room.

You enter your room and sit on the edge of the bed for a moment before getting back up and walking to your suitcase and zipping it open and pulling your stuff out, after a good fifteen minutes of unpacking you sit back on your bed looking over the boxes that contained your things "let's try and hook up my games console to my TV" you say as you again head over to your stuff and rummage around for your console, "there you are" you say out loud pulling the console out the box it was in and you start hooking it up to the TV, it takes ten minutes to sort it out and you soon are blasting zombies all over the place, you glance over at the clock and notice it's been over an hour since you started playing and you decide to have a small break.


What Happens Next?
142.title: Find an excuse to leave

choices: You do as she says and eat the food
You tell her you'll eat it soon
You refuse to eat the food
1421.content:
As you pace around your room stretching your legs the door to your room opens and Missy walks in holding a tray with a bowl sitting atop it "hey i brought you some food" she says as she sets down the tray which has a bowl of tomato soup and three slices of bread next to it "It's a shame you left your family are a right bunch of pigs" she says with a laugh as a joke, you sit down as Missy walks over and sits next to you "listen don't think of me as someone who is out to harm you my job is to look after you" you nod your head before looking at Missy her long red hair seemed to shine as her sparkling blue eyes looked like the ocean, her face was soft with her small dainty nose and her lips were not too thick or too thin, above the neck Missy looked like any teenagers wet dream, as you gaze into her eyes you start to feel strangely submissive towards her and you lean in for a kiss but Missy doesn't pull back or stop you she kisses you back instead, the world just seemed to phase out as you locked lips and time slowed then finally Missy pulls away with a smile "good boy now why don't you eat up yeah?" she says pointing to the bowl.

15.content:
You decide to explore the mansion to see what's around so you dump your bags just inside your door and venture off down the hall passing your parents room and past a small staircase leading up to the next floor, "this mansion is huge" you ponder out loud and open a dark oak door which leads to what looks to be a library of some kind with rows upon rows of books and a desk sitting at the far end with a PC and a stack of books next to it, you decide to keep looking around and head back spotting the staircase you decide to head up to the 3rd floor the hall was not as well kept as the lower halls and so you feel you shouldn't be on this floor but the doors look almost new which adds to your confusion but you push it out of your mind since you live here you're welcome to go anywere you like.


You walk down the hall peeking in through the odd door seeing mainly empty rooms and store rooms you decide to head back down seeing nothing of interest when you notice a door ajar at the end of the hall so being curious you start walking and peek inside to find a room with a mirror and nothing else, you are unsure of the purpose of the mirror except it was just forgoten about when cleaning the room out so you decide to head back downstairs and as you get down the stairs you hear Missy talking to your mum about renting out rooms on the 3rd floor east hall and you realise thats the floor you just came from and the thought of other people in the mansion angered you, you could hear the footsteps and conversation of your mum and Missy fading out as they walked the other way allowing you to leave the staircase and get to your room as you place your hand on the handle you decide on what to do next.
